# getOauthNonce

Turnkey requires the nonce in the id token to be in this format.

## Import

```ts
import { getOauthNonce } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### turnkeyPublicKey

`string`
key from a Turnkey iframe

## Returns

`string`
nonce to be used in OIDC
